dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle financial risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold and calculated risks to maximize returns.
Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and avoid high-risk investments.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through practical experience and experimentation.
Your FarTwin will prefer to understand concepts through theoretical frameworks and abstract thinking.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be confident and enthusiastic in social situations, making friends easily.
Your FarTwin will prefer to observe and listen, preferring one-on-one interactions or solo activities.

dimensions.label: Technical Interest
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be fascinated by the potential of technology to solve problems and improve lives.
Your FarTwin will approach technology with a healthy dose of skepticism, weighing risks before embracing new tools or methods.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate their artistic vision through words, writing poetry or composing music.
Your FarTwin will create art using visual mediums like painting, drawing, or photography.

dimensions.label: Competitive Drive
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for excellence, pushing themselves to win and outperform others.
Your FarTwin will focus on supporting their team and working together to achieve shared goals.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach conflicts with clarity and assertiveness, directly addressing the issue at hand.
Your FarTwin will seek to find common ground, using tact and empathy to resolve disputes peacefully.

dimensions.label: Financial Goal Orientation
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize financial stability?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on achieving immediate financial goals, such as saving for a emergency fund or paying off debt.
Your FarTwin will prioritize long-term financial security, investing in retirement accounts and wealth-building strategies.
